name: ACC Solitaire [ Freecell ] HD Free - Classic Card Cames for iPad & iPhone
name_original: ACC Solitaire [ Freecell ] HD Free - Classic Card Cames for iPad & iPhone
description:
!!! Awesome classic Freecell solitaire game is now better than ever !!!

Awesome graphics, animations and gameplay that would work on your iPhone, iPod and iPad. This game contains scoring system, so you can try to climb higher position on hi-score table and compare result with your friends.

[ features ]

• Two control system (drag and drop or tap to move)
• Scoring system
• Game Center Leaderboards
• Unlimited undo
• Possiblities move card groups if enough free cells available
• Auto complete to finish game
• Great game statistics
• Responsive controls
• Universal app, so it work well on iPhone and iPad devices
• Unique and beautiful style
• Play your own background music
• Submit results to facebook wall (you choose)
• Rich features, of course you could just to play
• Relax and relieve stress.
• Smooth gameplay
• Smooth and beautiful animations

[ more games ]

We have also made other solitaire games, so type ”codecube brothers” to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the appstore! Happy gaming! :)

[ feedback ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support [at] ccbrothers [dot] com
